CustomField.formula: IF( Shell__c , IF(OR(Infleet_Unit_Involved__c , New_Unit_Involved__c), CASE(SBQQ__Quote__r.To_be_entered_into_pipeline__c , 'Term 1', New_Infleet_ROA_1__c , 'Term 2', New_Infleet_ROA_2__c, 'Term 3', New_Infleet_ROA_3__c, 'Term 4', New_Infleet_ROA_4__c, 'Term 5', New_Infleet_ROA_5__c, NULL ), IF(SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Upfronts', CASE( SBQQ__Quote__r.To_be_entered_into_pipeline_Upfront__c , 'Option 1', SBQQ__Quote__r.Upfront_Markup__c , 'Option 2', SBQQ__Quote__r.Upfront_Markup_2__c , 'Option 3', SBQQ__Quote__r.Upfront_Markup_3__c , 'Option 4', SBQQ__Quote__r.Upfront_Markup_4__c , 'Option 5', SBQQ__Quote__r.Upfront_Markup_5__c , NULL ), IF( SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Backend', CASE( SBQQ__Quote__r.To_be_entered_into_pipeline_Backend__c , 'Option 1', SBQQ__Quote__r.Backend_Markup__c , 'Option 2', SBQQ__Quote__r.Backend_Markup_2__c , 'Option 3', SBQQ__Quote__r.Backend_Markup_3__c , 'Option 4', SBQQ__Quote__r.Backend_Markup_4__c , 'Option 5', SBQQ__Quote__r.Backend_Markup_5__c , NULL ) ,NULL) ) ),NULL )
CustomField.label: ROA New/Infleet/Markup Selected
